heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_dawnbreaker
heroes.bio_loc:
在守卫离去后的千万年间诞生了光的时代，首个恒星的血脉中有部分开始结盟，一同对抗不停追赶他们祖先的混沌。他们自称光之子，见到其他的存在都不配接过守卫丢下的责任，而他们又渴望对黑暗的猛攻予以反击，于是他们创造了辉煌的军队，决意净化宇宙，消灭所有原初之夜的生物。

破晓辰星维罗拉是光之子的远古造物中最受珍视的战士，她是代表秩序和光明的闪耀先驱。打造自一颗幼年金属星辰的心脏，再以金色的气息注入生机，维罗拉的任务是将光之子的智慧之光播撒到宇宙最黑暗的角落——在无尽的战斗中挥舞她的上界之锤，让上天熊熊燃烧，使混沌无法接近。

后来，光之子还向破晓辰星透露了另一个目的。他们发现了一个方法，使整个宇宙都会被他们的中心之光所渗透——永远又全面地消灭黑暗——他们派维罗拉前去夺取一种神力的源泉，他们终极计划所缺的最后一样东西。但是，维罗拉和她的战锤首次迎来了失败，而她和她的主人们付出了惨痛的代价。光之子的光芒彻底熄灭，而破晓辰星在漆黑的广域中四处飘荡，经历了千万年的迷失后坠落到一个陌生的世界。

在那里，她陷入了沉睡，也得到了喘息，直到一颗年轻的恒星在徜徉时给一座远古的能量锻炉注入了燃料——锻炉也是光之子的圣物，像她一样，在一片狂风大作的红色荒原下荒废了数不尽的世代。现在，锻炉使她恢复了一小部分从前的力量，维罗拉苏醒后发现自己身处的世界受到战争和混沌的持续威胁。她明白，或许她的神明已经消逝，但是破晓辰星的重锤犹在——单凭她的意志以光明的名义将其挥舞自如。
heroes.hype_loc: 破晓辰星在战场的中央散发着万丈光芒，她乐于挥舞来自上界的战锤粉碎敌军，治疗附近的盟友。她也沉醉于将手中巨大的武器抛向敌阵，再与她的战锤在一道炽烈的尾迹中会合，她时刻等待着运用真正的宇宙之力飞去援助她的战友——不论她的敌人身在战场何处都将迎来溃败。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 飞跃前去援助队友，不论他们身在何处

abilities.name: dawnbreaker_fire_wreath
abilities.desc_loc: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
abilities.lore_loc: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
notes_loc: Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of %movement_speed% for the duration of the ability and takes a brief %self_stun_duration%s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward.
The first two strikes will slow enemy movement speed by %swipe_slow%%% for %sweep_stun_duration%s.
abilities.shard_loc: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50%% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by %shard_movement_penalty%%% down to a minimum of %movement_speed%.
facets_loc: 在星破天惊结束后每次破晓辰星挥击和锤击敌方英雄都会使%movespeed_bonus_radius%范围内她和所有友军获得攻击速度加成，持续%movespeed_bonus_duration%秒。

special_values.name: movespeed_bonus_self_max
special_values.heading_loc: 每次挥击的攻击速度加成：

special_values.name: movespeed_bonus_ally_max
special_values.heading_loc: 每次挥击的攻击速度加成（友军）：

abilities.name: dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer
abilities.desc_loc: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for %pause_duration% seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
abilities.lore_loc: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.
notes_loc: The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's Converge movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.
Starbreaker cannot be cast while the Hammer is out.
facets_loc: 上界重锤停在地面时，会产生天光现世的治疗和伤害效果，数值减少%hammer_solar_guardian_effectiveness_pct%%%，作用于重锤附近%hammer_solar_guardian_radius%范围。重锤的停留时间提升至%pause_duration%秒。
友方英雄在上界重锤的炽烈之径上行走会获得移动速度加成。

special_values.name: fire_trail_health_regen
special_values.heading_loc: 炽烈之径移动速度加成：

abilities.name: dawnbreaker_luminosity
abilities.desc_loc: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within %heal_radius% units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for %allied_healing_pct%%% of the amount.
abilities.lore_loc: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.
notes_loc: Luminosity Heal is increased by sources of Lifesteal Amplification.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
facets_loc: 只要破晓辰星击中目标时触发了熠熠生辉的强化攻击，她所有技能的冷却时间都会减少。

special_values.name: heal_from_creeps
special_values.heading_loc: 攻击普通单位治疗减少：

abilities.name: dawnbreaker_break_of_dawn
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever the sun comes out, Dawnbreaker reveals the whole map to allies for %reveal_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: dawnbreaker_solar_guardian
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within %max_offset_distance% units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
abilities.lore_loc: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.
notes_loc: Total flight duration is %abilitychanneltime% seconds of channel time + %airtime_duration% of flight time.
Cannot be cast without the Hammer.
abilities.scepter_loc: Solar Guardian's aura now lingers for %scepter_aura_duration%s after landing and follows Dawnbreaker around. Solar Guardian's heal per pulse is increased. Channel time and air time is reduced.

special_values.name: scepter_channel_time
special_values.heading_loc: 神杖升级持续施法时间：

facets.description_loc: 只要破晓辰星击中目标时触发了熠熠生辉的强化攻击，她所有技能的冷却时间都会减少。
facets.name: dawnbreaker_solar_charged

facets.description_loc: 在星破天惊结束后每次破晓辰星挥击和锤击敌方英雄都会使范围内她和附近友军获得攻击速度加成。
facets.name: dawnbreaker_blaze

facets.description_loc: 在上界重锤的炽烈之径上行走会获得移动速度加成。
facets.name: dawnbreaker_hearthfire

new_abilities.name: dawnbreaker_break_of_dawn
new_abilities.desc_loc: 只要太阳出来，破晓辰星就会对友军显示全地图，持续%reveal_duration%秒。
